Articles.Content: Was wondering if a mod could add me to a group so I can update my profile. I had done my 3 posts, but one of them vanished in the forum update, so I figured I'd make this my third instead.

Hello, and welcome to the forum.

Actually, those restrictions have already been removed from your account, as I see you have 8 posts by now. The limit was both imposed and removed automatically by our forum software, as a spambot prevention measure.

*more noticeably waves back*

Welcome to the madness that is the forums (assuming your not a lurker)

(assuming your not a lurker)

*cough* Yeah, I really dislike those lurkers, I definitely wouldn't want to be one myself. *shifts nervously*
